thread.title: Here’s What Celebrities And Others Have To Say About Jolly LLB 2
thread.title_full: Here’s What Celebrities And Others Have To Say About Jolly LLB 2

title: Here’s What Celebrities And Others Have To Say About Jolly LLB 2
text:
facebook 255 SHARES 
Jolly LLB got applauded by the critics and audience in the past, and the makers came back with a part two. The sequel has Akshay Kumar playing the lead actor, along with actress Huma Qureshi. Courtroom dramas are always interesting, as the twists and turns in the case leave you glued to your seats As the first part was exemplary, people had a lot of expectation with the upcoming sequel. Looks like Akshay did justice to his role as an advocate, as celebrities just cannot stop praising his work. So much, that even actor Arshad Warsi, who was replaced by Akshay in the sequel, was impressed by Akshay's stellar performance. Here's what celebs had to say about this new release. Brand @akshaykumar does it again,you just can't take your eyes off him,he is funny & fabulous.Throughly enjoyed #JollyLLB2 & the new Jolly. — Arshad Warsi (@ArshadWarsi) February 10, 2017 #JollyLLB2 is thrilling, exciting, soulful, humorous with power packed performances, @subkapoor direction is just brilliant. A must watch... — Arshad Warsi (@ArshadWarsi) February 10, 2017 This man is on a roll! Thoroughly enjoyed this jolly. Congrats to the team that pulled this off in 33 days! Fantastic! https://t.co/LyQyDA4M2k
